snippet.title: Biomorph - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out gameplay, boss fights, and more from Biomorph in this launch trailer for the hand-drawn Metroidvania adventure game. In Biomorph, you don't just defeat enemies; you conquer and absorb their powers to evolve into a formidable force. Each creature you vanquish transforms you, granting new abilities for combat and exploration. Biomorph is available now on Steam.

#Gaming #Games #Biomorph
